name: ai-image-generator
description: AI图像生成网站 - 部署在Cloudflare平台

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:worker
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy frontend/dist --project-name ai-image-generator-frontend --branch HEAD && cd worker && wrangler deploy
scripts.db:migrate: cd worker && wrangler d1 migrations apply ai-image-db
scripts.db:create: cd worker && wrangler d1 create ai-image-db
